actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to reduce from 12 to 5 years the creditable service requirements under the Federal employees group life and accidental death and dismemberment insurance and health benefits programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Reduces from twelve to five years the creditable service requirements under the Federal employees group life and accidental death and dismemberment insurance and health benefits programs. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8706 (b), 8714, 8901, and 8905)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to reduce from 12 to 5 years the creditable service requirements under the Federal employees group life and accidental death and dismemberment insurance and health benefits programs, and for other purposes.
